description: This is the main entry point of a React application, responsible for rendering the <App /> component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It sets up rendering within React.StrictMode for development and debugging purposes.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root container for rendering a React component tree into a DOM element.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the created root container.
